title: Fontsmith
content:
**[Indices](http://web.archive.org/web/20150205001524/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Indices) : [Type Foundries](http://web.archive.org/web/20150205001524/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Type%20Foundries) : Fontsmith**

[Fontsmith](http://web.archive.org/web/20150205001524/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Fontsmith) is a leading London based type design studio founded in 1999. The studio consists of a skilled team of creatives, lead by [Jason Smith](http://web.archive.org/web/20150205001524/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Jason%20Smith) and [Phil Garnham](http://web.archive.org/web/20150205001524/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Phil%20Garnham). Fontsmith is dedicated to designing and developing high quality typefaces for both independent release as well as bespoke fonts for international clients.
